field.label: Use manual capture for PayPal
field.tooltip: Should be on 'No' by default. If you have requested with Adyen Support for your PayPal integration to be on manual capture, set this to 'Yes'.

field.label: Capture on shipment for OpenInvoice Methods (Klarna, Ratepay and Afterpay)
field.tooltip: If you enable this function it will do a capture request to Adyen if you do a shipment for openinvoice payment methods.

field.label: Use auto-capture for OpenInvoice payments
field.tooltip: Applicable for Klarna and AfterPay only. By default OpenInvoice is set to manual capture. If you want auto capture you need to contact magento@adyen.com. After approval has been given, then you can set this option to 'Yes'.

field.label: Order status: payment capture (virtual products)
field.tooltip: (optional) Select only status assigned to state complete. Leave empty to use the same as normal products

field.label: Order status: pending Bank Transfer/SEPA orders
field.tooltip: By default, Adyen does not inform your Magento store about pending payments. If you want these notifications to be received, Go to Adyen Customer Area => Server Communication and add BankTransfer Pending Notification and Direct-Debit Pending Notification.

field.label: Send order confirmation email for Bank Transfer/SEPA
field.tooltip: Send a confirmation mail after Bank Tranfer/SEPA is placed (not yet paid). If you want these notifications to be received, Go to Adyen Customer Area => Server Communication and add BankTransfer Pending Notification and Direct-Debit Pending Notification.
